statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_admitted <= '2022-09-15';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE nurse_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, date_admitted FROM patients WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%medication%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE nurse_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY date_admitted DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE doctor_id = 2002 AND nurse_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC, date_admitted DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_admitted FROM patients WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL AND diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_status FROM patients WHERE patient_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_diagnosis = 'Cancer' AND patient_status = 'Active';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS average_age FROM patients WHERE patient_status = 'Active';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_type = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_treatments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM CareTeam WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT team_lead, team_size FROM CareTeam ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patient ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CareTeam WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY care_team_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM Patient WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM CarePlan WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM care_team_members;
SELECT id, name, role FROM care_team_members WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM care_team_members ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT id, name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM care_team_members
SELECT name, role FROM care_team_members ORDER BY role DESC
SELECT id, name, department_id FROM care_team_members WHERE department_id = 2
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patients.name, patient_records.record_date FROM patients JOIN patient_records ON patients.id = patient_records.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Record WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan, date_recorded FROM Medical_Record ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, full_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT full_name, gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' OR gender='Female';
SELECT Patients.full_name, Medical_Record.diagnosis, Medical_Record.treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN Medical_Record ON Patients.id = Medical_Record.patient_id WHERE Patients.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;

SELECT Medical_Team.team_name, Medical_Professionals.full_name AS team_lead_name, Medical_Professionals.specialty FROM Medical_Team JOIN Medical_Professionals ON Medical_Team.team_lead = Medical_Professionals.professional_id;
SELECT Care_Plan.status, count(*) AS num_patients FROM Care_Plan GROUP BY Care_Plan.status HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
